Summary Note:
Moretti De Luca Bruno and the RM met at a networking event in Rome. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Moretti De Luca Bruno is a 31 year old and comes from Italy.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Moretti De Luca Bruno is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Moretti earned his secondary school diploma from Istituto Tecnico Industriale Statale Enrico Mattei Roma in 2011.
He then attended Luiss Guido Carli, which he graduated in 2016.
Occupation History:
Moretti De Luca Bruno is a 31 year old Investment Banker from Italy.
Moretti De Luca Bruno launched his career as a Investment Banker at UniCredit S.p.A., where he gained valuable experience from 2017 till now.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 30000 EUR.
He has villa located in Reggio Calabria, worth 1678000 EUR.

He purchased townhouse in Udine, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1447000 EUR.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful house in Naples, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1320000 EUR.

Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, he received an inheritance of 830000 EUR in 2020, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Moretti as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
